channel.title: Consumer Sentiment on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Consumer Sentiment on FinanClub

item.title: FNMA
item.description: score:-149 Chances: Fannie Mae CEO Priscilla Almodovar believes in the importance of homeownership and its impact on people’s lives.Strong employment numbers and hotter-than-expected inflation data may keep mortgage rates higher for longer, according to Fannie Mae.Consumer sentiment toward housing and homebuying sentiment have increased, indicating potential positive trends in the housing market.
